languages.text: {n}Маражай, кажется, полностью пропускает тираду Чорды мимо ушей и как ни в чем не бывало продолжает, неотрывно рассматривая человека со вскрытым черепом:{/n} "Жаль, что Вольный Торговец, с которым сошлись мои пути, не способ{mf|ен|на} на подобные тонкости удовольствий... или же способ{mf|ен|на}?" {n}Обжигающий взгляд ксеноса упирается в вас.{/n}

{n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай, кажется, полностью пропускает тираду Чорды мимо ушей и как ни в чем не бывало продолжает, неотрывно рассматривая человека со вскрытым черепом:{/n} "Жаль, что Вольный Торговец, с которым сошлись мои пути, не способ{mf|ен|на} на подобные тонкости удовольствий... или же способ{mf|ен|на}?" {n}Обжигающий взгляд ксеноса упирается в вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I have crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He flashes his eyes at you.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋似乎完全没有在乎她的咆哮，继续不紧不慢地说着，目光死死地盯着那个可怜的受害者。{/n}“遗憾的是，与我同行的行商浪人却不懂得如何享受如此美妙的滋味……还是说，{mf|他|她}已经懂了？”{n}他朝你眨了眨眼，目光中充满了渴望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋似乎完全没有在乎她的咆哮，继续不紧不慢地说着，目光死死地盯着那个可怜的受害者。{/n}“遗憾的是，与我同行的行商浪人却不懂的如何享受如此美妙的滋味……还是说，{mf|他|她}已经懂了？”{n}他朝你眨了眨眼。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは彼女の長い演説を無視すると、しれっと喋り続けた。彼の視線は、哀れな犠牲者に釘付けだ。{/n}「俺が出会った自由開拓者が、こんな面白い光景を楽しめないとは残念だ…それとも、本当は楽しんでいるのか？」{n}彼は食い入るようにあなたを見ている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは彼女の長い演説を無視すると、しれっと喋り続けた。彼の視線は、哀れな犠牲者に釘付けだ。{/n}「俺が出会った自由開拓者が、こんな面白い光景を楽しめないとは残念だ…それとも、本当は楽しんでいるのか？」{n}彼はあなたをチラリと見る。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai parece haber ignorado por completo su ataque y continúa hablando con la mirada fija en la víctima:{/n} «Es una lástima que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente con {mf|el|la} que me he cruzado no sea capaz de disfrutar de tales placeres... ¿O sí que lo es?». {n}Te dirige una mirada hambrienta.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai parece haber ignorado por completo su ataque y continúa hablando con la mirada fija en la víctima:{/n} «Es una lástima que {mf|el|la} comerciante independiente con {mf|el|la} que me he cruzado no sea capaz de disfrutar de tales placeres... ¿O sí que lo es?». {n}Te dirige la mirada.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai scheint ihre Tirade vollkommen ignoriert zu haben. Er spricht ganz beiläufig weiter, den Blick noch immer auf das elende Opfer gerichtet:{/n} "Welch ein Jammer, dass {mf|der Freihändler, dem|die Freihändlerin, der} ich über den Weg gelaufen bin, nicht in der Lage ist, solch edle Vergnügungen zu genießen ... oder ist {mf|er|sie} das?" {n}Er beobachtet dich mit gierigen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai scheint ihre Tirade vollkommen ignoriert zu haben. Er spricht ganz beiläufig weiter, den Blick noch immer auf das elende Opfer gerichtet:{/n} "Welch ein Jammer, dass {mf|der Freihändler, dem|die Freihändlerin, der} ich über den Weg gelaufen bin, nicht in der Lage ist, solch edle Vergnügungen zu genießen ... oder ist {mf|er|sie} das?" {n}Er sieht dich mit funkelnden Augen an.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai semble avoir totalement ignoré la tirade d'Incendia et continue de parler d'une voix nonchalante, le regard toujours fixé sur la victime :{/n} « Quel dommage que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dont j'ai croisé la route soit incapable d'apprécier de tels raffinements... mais je me trompe peut-être ? » {n}demande-t-il en tournant un regard affamé vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai semble avoir totalement ignoré la tirade d'Incendia et continue de parler d'une voix nonchalante, le regard toujours fixé sur la victime :{/n} « Quel dommage que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dont j'ai croisé la route en premier soit incapable d'apprécier de tels raffinements... mais je me trompe peut-être ? » {n}demande-t-il en se tournant vers vous.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bu tiradı tamamen duymazdan gelmiş gibi duran Marazhai, bakışlarını acınası hâldeki kurbana odaklayıp umursamazca konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Yolumun kesiştiği Hür Tacir'in böylesi rafine hazların tadını çıkarmayı bilmiyor oluşu çok yazık. Yoksa yanılıyor muyum?" {n}Hırslı bakışlarla seni izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai appears to have ignored her tirade completely and continues speaking nonchalantly, his gaze still focused on the wretched victim:{/n} "Such a shame it is that the Rogue Trader I crossed paths with is not capable of enjoying such fine delights... or is {mf|he|she}?" {n}He watches you, his eyes devouring.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, bu tiradı tamamen duymazdan gelmiş gibi görünüyor ve bakışlarını, acınası hâldeki kurbana odaklayarak, umursamazca konuşmaya devam ediyor.{/n} "Yolumun kesiştiği Hür Tacir'in böylesi rafine hazların tadını çıkarmayı bilmiyor oluşu çok yazık. Ya da en azından ben öyle biliyorum." {n}Seni hırslı bakışlarla izliyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
